ModMetaData.name: Quick Paint Terrain Brush Dev Tool
ModMetaData.author: ProgrammerLily
ModMetaData.description:
Comprehensive terrain painting toolkit for RimWorld map designers and developers. Includes both solid brushes and spray paint tools for creating natural, varied terrain patterns.
This mod provides advanced terrain painting tools with circular brushes and spray functionality. Perfect for rapid terrain prototyping, map design, and creating realistic terrain transitions.
Features: • Circular Brushes: Single cell, radius 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, and 32 • Spray Paint Tools: 10% coverage for natural, scattered terrain patterns • Paint-while-dragging: Hold and drag to paint continuously • Visual brush preview under mouse cursor • All terrain types supported through intuitive submenus • Integrated into Debug Menu under "Terrain Painter" category
Tools Available: • Brushes: Full coverage circular painting tools for solid terrain areas • Spray Paint (10%): Sparse coverage tools for natural terrain mixing and transitions
Usage: 1. Open the Debug Menu (Development mode required) 2. Search for "Terrain Painter" in the Actions/tools 3. Choose tool type: "Brushes" for solid coverage or "Spray Paint (10%)" for sparse coverage 4. Select desired radius (Single cell through Radius 32) 5. Choose terrain type from the submenu 6. Click and drag on map to paint terrain
The spray paint tools apply terrain randomly to only 10% of cells within the brush radius, creating natural, scattered patterns perfect for mixing terrain types or creating realistic transitions between different ground types.
